# **Data Acquisition**

```{r}
#| label: Datasets
#| echo: false
library(readr)
nama_10r_3gdp <- read_delim("nama_10r_3gdp.tsv", 
    delim = "\t", escape_double = FALSE, 
    na = "NA", trim_ws = TRUE, 
    show_col_types = FALSE)

demo_r_pjanaggr3 <- read_delim("demo_r_pjanaggr3.tsv", 
    delim = "\t", escape_double = FALSE, 
    na = "NA", trim_ws = TRUE,
    show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Change file name nama_10r_3gdp to gdp
gdp <- nama_10r_3gdp
# Filter sorted by provided following contries: Finland (FI), Germany (DE) & Romania (RO). Furthermore, filter selected period 2000:2020.
countries_to_keep <- c("FI", "DE", "RO")
filtered_data <- gdp %>%
  filter(substr(`unit,geo\\time`, 9, 10) %in% countries_to_keep)
selected_columns <- filtered_data %>%
  select(`unit,geo\\time`, `2000`:`2020`)
# Renamed file from selected_colums to gdp_DE_FI_RO
gdp_DE_FI_RO <- selected_columns 
```
